description: New York City is a major world hub with an unmistakable yet evolving skyline. Yet this thriving city wasn't always a towering metropolis. A New Skyline details the history and evolution of New York City's skyline. The book can also be used to teach students how to effectively sequence events and the proper use of adjectives. The book and lesson are also available for levels T and Z.
